title: Sip Or Spill: Kristin Takes Shots Of Lawn Mower Clipping
description:
Last week during Sip or Spill, Kristin whipped up Bert’s favorite not-so-favorite drink! GOAT CHEESE SMOOTHIE! Yes, it’s as gross as it sounds.
This week it’s Kristin’s turn again and she got the sweet chance at taste testing Tommy's weight loss green smoothie, and apparently, it tastes like wet lawn mower clippings.
